channel.title: neo4j on dpritchett.net by Daniel Pritchett

item.title: I'm Guest Posting on Spree and Neo4j for GraphStory.com
item.description: I’ve recently been working with some friends at a local startup called Graph Story. They provide a hosted graph database solution using Neo4j. They are looking to build up some introductory content to help developers get started with graph databases, so I wrote them a series of posts. Here’s the first in the series: Graph Kit for Ruby Part 1: Letâ€™s Build a Recommendation Engine for a Spree Store.
